Text:
hardcoded subs?
anyone with actual info on the quality of the file?
TedLilly

Thanks for putting this up.

I should let others know that there are non-english subs that make it difficult to read the english subs that the movie contains when actors are speaking other languages.

Other than that it was enjoyable to watch. No audio or video problems.
